lyrics:
8 contributorsfor no one lyricsverse 1
im getting out im leaving here

from everything i hate
now this is my kind of disaster

pick up our friends tell them
lets all get in dont ask what its for
sub woofer kicking it

these spinning rims dont go no faster

chorus
we can ride all night
and were not gonna stop for the pigs or no one
just follow the light
and were not gonna stop for the pigs or no one

verse 2

the places that caused us hurt were done
if we keep moving forward
maybe well forget where were from

well fuel this car with our rejection
see korn liveget tickets as low as 69you might also likechorus
we can ride all night
and were not gonna stop for the pigs or no one

verse 3

if you wanted to know where youre in deep now
